title: Google Account (com.apple.google-oauth)
description: The payload that configures a Google account.

AccountDescription.title: Account Description
AccountDescription.description: A user-visible description of the Google account, shown in the Mail and Settings apps.

AccountName.title: Account Name
AccountName.description: The user's full name for the Google account. This name appears in sent messages.

EmailAddress.title: Email Address
EmailAddress.description: The full Google email address for the account.

CommunicationServiceRules.title: Communication Service Rules
CommunicationServiceRules.description: The communication service handler rules for this account.

DefaultServiceHandlers.title: Default Service Handlers
DefaultServiceHandlers.description: A dictionary that defines which app to use for audio calls from this account.

AudioCall.title: App for audio calls
AudioCall.description: The bundle identifier for the default application that handles audio calls to contacts from this account.

VPNUUID.title: VPNUUID
VPNUUID.description: The VPNUUID of the per-app VPN the account uses for network communication. Available in iOS 14 and later.
